title: News24.com | The 'new normal': SA likely heading for 'partial lockdown', says Winde
description: South Africa is headed for a "partial lockdown", says Western Cape Premier Alan Winde, as the next likely phase after the current super-strict stay-at-home order.
content:
South Africa is headed for a "partial lockdown", says Western Cape Premier Alan Winde, as the next likely phase after the current super-strict stay-at-home order.
